website_summaries.verdict: An inexpensive option for those wanting a smaller bench with high online reviews.
pros: Lightweight flat bench for easy mobility
Compact design for customers seeking a space-saving model
cons: Some buyers had problems with the benches' durability

customer_reviews.title: Great bench for the price!
customer_reviews.text: I recently started the Kayla Itsines BBG workout plan and needed a bench for the workouts. This was easy to assemble and works perfect! Great simple bench that gets the job done.
customer_reviews.author: J.Mo

customer_reviews.title: Major flaw in manufacturing, modification in machine shop needed to make this work.
customer_reviews.text: If you dont have access to quite a few tools this will not assemble correctly. The t nuts on the main pad by embroidery were placed at incorrect locations. I had to modify a mounting hole in the main support bar stock in order to make this piece assemble properly. Also there is general workmanship issues with upholstery work. Hidem is ment to hide staples not have staples randomly in.
customer_reviews.author: Hans Forsman @hforz

customer_reviews.title: Great bench for the price. Perfect for your home gym.
customer_reviews.text: This is a great bench for the price. Easy to assemble and not awkward how the weight is distributed. When I purchased the bench the advertisement on line read that it can withstand up to 600lbs I found out differently when I opened the box and was assembling the bench and the directions advised up to 300lbs. I don’t plan on going to 600lbs it’s for my home gym. I already put the first work out in the books with it and it was great. Also it doesn’t take up a lot of space.
customer_reviews.author: The Q-Man

customer_reviews.title: Good for the price
customer_reviews.text: The bench is perfectly adequate but I deducted one star for the poor condition of the (re)packaging (particularly the loose hardware). When it arrived the box was moderately damaged and the hardware pack had been opened so there were screws and washers loose everywhere. Fortunately none of the hardware was missing, and I was able to assemble in about 5-10 minutes (with the aid of a good screwdriver and allen key bit (not included). I'm 6'1" and the bench is long enough for me to do all of the movements that I typically do on a flat bench, and seems sturdy enough for me to do plyometric jumping movements without being concerned that it will break or wobble.
customer_reviews.author: ky_yaege

customer_reviews.title: Nice bench!
customer_reviews.text: This is actually a very nice bench. I was worried it was going to be cheaply made since it only cost $40, but it's very well made. It was very easy to put together, and it took me by myself about 20 minutes to insert all the screws. Everything u need to put it together is included. The bench is well-padded, sturdy, and a good height. I'm 5'4, 140 lbs and it's very comfortable for me with extra room. I would definitely recommend this bench to anyone needing a cheap but sturdy workout bench.
customer_reviews.author: Ursula Keene

customer_reviews.title: Space saver
customer_reviews.text: Very sturdy bench. I am 6 ft tall 240 pounds and this bench can take my weight
customer_reviews.author: vickmohabeer

customer_reviews.title: it's a bench.
customer_reviews.text: This bench that I received appears to have been a return from a previous customer. Instructions on where to place the safety warning stickers, yet the stickers were already placed on the bench. Hardware packet was ripped open already, and there were 5 less screws and washers than required to complete assembly. Granted, a trip to the hardware store and fifty cents solved the issue, but it was frustrating and inconvenient nonetheless. There are so many basic benches to choose from out there, not sure I'd go with this one.
customer_reviews.author: BSO

customer_reviews.title: Okay
customer_reviews.text: My husband installed this for me easily and with no problems. My only complaint is the material on top already has a tear where I placed a 10 pound weight on it. I wish the material was more durable considering the weight placed on it was not even heavy. And No I did not place said weight on top of the bench hard either!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Does what it needs to do, but you get what you pay for!
customer_reviews.text: You get what you pay for. This bench was super easy to assemble (I did it myself in under 10 minutes) and appears to be sturdy. However, the material covering the padded part of the bench is cheap. Like cheap to the point where I'm worried that putting one of my dumbbells on it could rip the vinyl. It wasn't sewn on properly in parts either, so it wrinkles and is loose at the corners...That being said, I use it and it does what it needs to do. My garage doesn't need a Rogue bench, so I'm cool with some cheap vinyl.
customer_reviews.author: G. Levy

customer_reviews.title: Great bench for workouts
customer_reviews.text: Great for my workouts, easy to put together came with Allen wrench. Directions look confusing but just use your brain.. it’s not hard at all! Sturdy and good quality for the price! Def recommend this to anyone looking for a basic flat bench (I think it supports like 300 lbs) for regular workouts, nothing too crazy heavy.
customer_reviews.author: Ffitz

customer_reviews.title: Its rigid yet sturdy design allows even the most out of shape person ...
customer_reviews.text: The most inexpensive workout bench I was able to find, and it feels and looks quality. Its rigid yet sturdy design allows even the most out of shape person feel like they are making progress with free weights. I did however have one very minor defect on my bench: there was a small bump of some substance that I can only really describe as tar that is stuck to a small part of the white fabric of the bench top. Its very small and hard to see unless its pointed out or closely inspected. Overall, it delivered in more areas than expected, and the minor defect doesnt detract enough from the bench to lessen my satisfaction.
customer_reviews.author: Matthew

customer_reviews.title: product sold as "condition new" but was obviously a return and resold without checking it
customer_reviews.text: Returned the product before it was even assembled. Every item in the box was packed in ripped open bags. The cushion of the bench had a gash on one side of it and the bottom of the bench material was loose. The cryo-package containing the bolts and washers was torn opened and was supposed to contain 18 bolts and 18 washers. Many of the bolts and washers ended up loose in the shipping box and we ended up with 17 bolts and 19 washers. If i wanted a used item, I would have purchased one.
customer_reviews.author: Judy Lewis

customer_reviews.title: All the bench I need.
customer_reviews.text: Shipping took too long in my opinion, but that is not the bench's fault. This is good sturdy bench that suits my needs. It was easy to assemble, and does everything I need it to. I have not pushed the maximum weight limit, but so far it has been very sturdy. I certainly not have heard wood cracking as others have stated. It is plenty solid for what I need.
customer_reviews.author: Karbo

customer_reviews.title: I recommend it highly good price good quality
customer_reviews.text: My son and I are fairly big man and I hoped for the price it would be the quality I needed and sure enough we’ve been using it for a few months now and we’re quite happy with it for the price it is a damn good deal
customer_reviews.author: Thomas

customer_reviews.title: Getting ripped...
customer_reviews.text: What can I say about this bench the Ladies Man is so happy and getting ripped.. And the ladies dig it...💪👦👍
customer_reviews.author: THE LADIES MAN

customer_reviews.title: Glad they did though
customer_reviews.text: Just got this today, it came in a double box, which Amazon doesn't always do. Glad they did though, big hole in the outside box. The inside box with the bench in it was fine though. The screws had come out of their sealed package and were loose in the inside box, but were all there. It was very easy to put together and really we only needed an allen wrench, which was included. It seems very sturdy, but we haven't used it yet. We will update this once we have had it a while.
customer_reviews.author: SmallTownGirl

customer_reviews.title: Came with rust
customer_reviews.text: Seemed like it might be a good product, but after arriving a day late, we found rust dust inside the bars. Decided not to trust safety to it and returned it. It also had the end all taped up like it had fallen open at some point.
customer_reviews.author: Connor Stephens

customer_reviews.title: Only 17 inches high, but still happy with it.
customer_reviews.text: I'm happy with this bench. It is light, but sturdy, and does not take up a ton of room. One thing to mention is that the specs list it as 18 inches high, but mine is actually a little under 17 inches. That probably won't make much of a difference to most people, but if you are looking for a specific height, be aware.
customer_reviews.author: AmzReviewer

customer_reviews.title: Great simple work out bench.
customer_reviews.text: I was looking for something simple and solid after my last bench broke, the welds gave out. This bench after assembled feels really solid and strong. It says 300lb limit but it feels like it could hold anything. Once you see the size of the square tubing that makes up the frame you'll feel safe with this bench. My work out is becoming streamlined and simplistic and this is all I really need to get a good upper body work out with my dumbbells. Its really easy to move around room to room, it just makes one heck of a bench.
customer_reviews.author: J. Palmer

customer_reviews.title: Not sturdy
customer_reviews.text: Not as sturdy as I thought it would be. I made sure to screw the bolts super tight. It squeaks and shifts so I can’t do too much on it. If you have the extra bucks I’d say invest in a sturdier bench
customer_reviews.author: Jamese

customer_reviews.title: Adequate
customer_reviews.text: It seems to be a bit wobbly. Not sure why but I have to tighten screws periodically. The padding seems to not be as flat. It's as if there is bunching under leather (or fake leather).
customer_reviews.author: KKJ

customer_reviews.title: Great item
customer_reviews.text: Really happy with this item. I am a 5'5" inch woman and put it together myself [even though instructions say two people needed]. It was not hard to put together at all; took about 20 minutes. Stable, comfortable, perfect size for home gym and by far the least expensive item I found on line. Looks good too. FYI - The nuts and bolts were mysteriously NOT in a plastic bag inside the main box and so I had to shake out the box several times to assure I had all required 18 nuts and bolts. So don't toss box until you are done. Good value and would certainly buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Avid Reader

customer_reviews.title: NOT RECOMMENDED
customer_reviews.text: The product was already damaged, RUSTED, ripped, and dirty as if someone was giving me their trash. Not all parts were wrapped to protect it from damage during shipment either... I don’t think anyone would like their new bench to be in this shape.
customer_reviews.author: Michael ParkJung

customer_reviews.title: Awesome weight bench
customer_reviews.text: Awesome weight bench! I wish it was adjustable, but I knew when purchasing it that it wasn't. It fits perfectly in our fitness room/ office. We set it up ourselves with NO trouble!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: sturdy little weight bench
customer_reviews.text: This is a sturdy little weight bench. The square metal frame is sturdy and it connects firmly to the bench. I'm a woman with a bad lower back, but it's light enough for me to move around. I don't know how it would fare under the weight of a larger person, but my kids can jump and climb on it without any worries. It doesn't wobble at all.
customer_reviews.author: jsk

customer_reviews.title: Box came in deplorable condition
customer_reviews.text: Pretty good bench but the box it came in was almost completely destroyed and because of that some screws were missing. Luckily I had some screws of my own.
customer_reviews.author: giorgio

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy
customer_reviews.text: It is just big enough for me to complete dumbbell presses on (I'm 6ft exactly). Assembly was easy and it feels sturdy. Every once and a while one of the legs will begin to loosen so I keep the allen wrench nearby and tighten it. No issues, and a good buy for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Ryan

customer_reviews.title: A bench fit for Kings
customer_reviews.text: I bought some other CAP products and this bench is on par with the quality I expect from this company. It was easily assembled and I’ve put my weight plus bench weight and it’s just as sturdy. Great product
customer_reviews.author: Huston

customer_reviews.title: Solid buy
customer_reviews.text: Seems very sturdy. Assembly was simple - even without instructions. A bench is a bench, but this cheap one is about as good as any. Affordable and durable - worth the money.
customer_reviews.author: Daniel M.

customer_reviews.title: Useful bench for small area
customer_reviews.text: Bench is convenient to store & doesn't take up a lot of room.
customer_reviews.author: B. Lyn

customer_reviews.title: It comes easy to assemble
customer_reviews.text: You aren't going to beat this little bench for the price. It comes easy to assemble...( I didn't need instructions)....just have your wrenches on the ready. Padding firm but nicely adequate and supportive and good quality. Perfect for my dumbbell movements at home like presses and one arm back rows etc. ...another fine addition to my ever growing home gym.
customer_reviews.author: james

customer_reviews.title: Works as intended
customer_reviews.text: Hasn’t collapsed under the weight of me and my weights! I feel secure enough to do my bench presses on it.
customer_reviews.author: Kailin Dart

customer_reviews.title: Not what I hoped.
customer_reviews.text: The bolts and washers come lose almost every time. The bottom cross legs are wobbly. It also makes a cracking sound when being used for benching and other heavier weighted activities.
customer_reviews.author: Bran&Zan

customer_reviews.title: Solid, dependable, great price
customer_reviews.text: Not the sturdiest bench in the world, but it's great for the price and easy to assemble. I wouldn't use this if you were an extreme powerlifter benching hundreds of pounds, but for less extreme use cases it's perfect.
customer_reviews.author: SemicolonSiren

customer_reviews.title: No problem here, great price does the job!
customer_reviews.text: Just wanted to say, I got what I expected. I've bought a few different pieces from CAP Barbell & all have worked out to my satisfaction. I know the previous review was bad and actually I think I know why your bench wobbles. Mine initially wobbled a bit but I loosened the screws that are at the base of the legs then retightened them. It definitely helped and now it doesn't wobble one bit. It's a sturdy bench that does the job!
customer_reviews.author: DR3

customer_reviews.title: Bargain hunters!!!!
customer_reviews.text: If you’re looking for a bench that’ll last you a few years at cheap price this is a good bench. For 50 dollars I have a bench where I can bench press for 5 to years. So I’d say this is a great buy. If you’re looking for high end quality expect to pay over 500.
customer_reviews.author: Manuel Rivera

customer_reviews.title: Read my edit.
customer_reviews.text: Very quick to assemble, packaging outside was moderate to good and everything was wrapped and in place inside the box, sturdy when on a hard floor (wobbles slightly when on a carpet-like floor), comfortable on the back, and just overall good (will keep updating this if anything occurs). EDIT: Used for sitting now and the screws do NOT hold in, making the bench wobbly after a week of using.
customer_reviews.author: Ian

customer_reviews.title: The material is tough and very easy to clean
customer_reviews.text: It's cheap and it stands up when you sit on it. The material is tough and very easy to clean. The bolts all hold tight as you'd expect from a quality bench. If you don't need a lot of bells and whistles this is the bench for you.
customer_reviews.author: Yu-Tang Clan

customer_reviews.title: Adequate bench for home gym
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for use in a home gym. I'm 6'5" and 225lb and I fit comfortably on the bench. I have worked out with up to 225lb on the bar and I didn't experience any wobble from the bench. If you are looking to for a bench that can support heavier loads then spend the money on a sturdier bench.
customer_reviews.author: BIG WILL

customer_reviews.title: Not rated for weight as described
customer_reviews.text: Written descriptions said its rated for 500lbs but the bench has a sticker saying its rated for only 300lbs. Walmarts description stated the 300lb max.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Worth the price
customer_reviews.text: Don't listen to the people saying it's not sturdy, they probably don't know how to assemble it correctly. The quality of the material isn't the best but it gets the job done. Some of the bolts were outside of the packaging but they were all still there. I would recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I ordered this product and the screws were missing. ...
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this product and the screws were missing. I called to report this incident and I was told they were going to send me a replacement. The placement also had all the screws missing. I called back to report it a second time. I no longer want the product. I was told by representative that they were going to refer this matter to investigation dept. It is my opinion that this product it is defective directly from manufacturer.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Solid
customer_reviews.text: Big, bulky, and stable. Imagine a gym bench. Yeah that’s what it does best.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great sturdy BASIC Bench
customer_reviews.text: I kind of knew what I was buying when I got this bench so for what it is, 5 stars. It's a little short but sturdy as hell. Doesn't have a longer chair back or anything, but again knew that when purchasing. Got it because it was basic and cheap, but probably would get something with more features in the future.
customer_reviews.author: Rich C

customer_reviews.title: poor stitching
customer_reviews.text: Sturdy bench but the stitching was loose and coming apart at the seam. Sent it back.
customer_reviews.author: Marb

customer_reviews.title: Easy assembling but it is very unsturdt and the pad ...
customer_reviews.text: I guess you get what you pay for. Easy assembling but it is very unsturdt and the pad is way to narrow. I had a Weider, extremely sturdy and wide padding. An extremely good product, but more expensive. Spend a little more and get a Weider.
customer_reviews.author: Snapper

customer_reviews.title: Good for garage gym or dumbell workouts. Not for heavy benching though.
customer_reviews.text: God for a small DIY gym. I have mine in my garage gym. It's small but handles my weight (190 lbs) very well. I am also 5'8 so it's perfect for me. Maybe not so much if you're taller.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Seems pretty solid, went together easily
customer_reviews.text: Seems pretty solid, went together easily. When there's no weight on it there is a slight "rock to it because not all 4 corners seem to be touching the ground. But it's minimal and as soon as you sit or lay in it, it feels solid and does not move
customer_reviews.author: Elliott Lee

customer_reviews.title: Bench is uneven
customer_reviews.text: Was excited to get this bench. Like other reviews it was easy to assemble. The problem is it is uneven. I am having to put something under one side to compensate for this defect. I will use it a few more time to determine if I can live with this defect or return it and hope for one that is level.
customer_reviews.author: F Sofie

customer_reviews.title: Nice!
customer_reviews.text: Easy to install and fits my 300 pound 6’2 frame. It’s a good brand and great price! It was backorder since it was in demand. Nice product.
customer_reviews.author: Saul S.

customer_reviews.title: Super sturdy
customer_reviews.text: Sturdy and much longer than i expected, mainly use it for dumbell benchpress and at 6'6" i fit perfect, also very simple to assemble
customer_reviews.author: knapp90

customer_reviews.title: unsecure poor design
customer_reviews.text: The bench is very wobbly even with all the bolts nice and tight, poor design, poorly made (loose tolerances), doesn't feel safe to use,
customer_reviews.author: Joseph Figueroa

customer_reviews.title: Great buy!
customer_reviews.text: I'm surprised how sturdy and nice this bench is for the price. I use it for lifting and box jumps too.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Not bad for the money
customer_reviews.text: Not a bad bench for the money. One of the screws will not stay in, however, but overall the bench is decent for the price. There is enough space to do many dumbbell-based exercises.
customer_reviews.author: NicholasTop Contributor: Photography

customer_reviews.title: Not all the holes line up for the screws.
customer_reviews.text: Even though I couldn't use all the hardware, it still seems solid. I would have greater confidence if it did.
customer_reviews.author: Michel W. Burgess

customer_reviews.title: Consider
customer_reviews.text: Product is a bit expensive so I assumed it would hold up well, is uneven even after checking for my own mess up. Works fine once you get leveled
customer_reviews.author: Adam Mudd

customer_reviews.title: Just What I Needed
customer_reviews.text: This was just what I needed for using my dumbbells. I was pleasantly surprised to see that the bench was almost out together when I got it. What I had to do to finish the job took only a few minutes.
customer_reviews.author: Ron Head

customer_reviews.title: Would buy again.
customer_reviews.text: Great bench, benches 315 without any problems and that’s not even including my weight. Also the bench install was super easy. Took me about 10-15 minutes.
customer_reviews.author: Alex Lung

customer_reviews.title: Solid, Quality Construction. Should Last a While.
customer_reviews.text: Not much to add. Exactly what I was looking for
customer_reviews.author: Keaves Sharpi

customer_reviews.title: ... LOT of benches before buying this one and am happy with my purchase
customer_reviews.text: I looked at a LOT of benches before buying this one and am happy with my purchase. Very solid and well constructed. I can step up onto it without the bench rocking or moving at all. I am 6' 1" and the bench is JUST long enough for me to lay on. If you are taller than me you may want a longer bench, other than that it's great for the price.
customer_reviews.author: william farrell

customer_reviews.title: Great bench (for the price)!
customer_reviews.text: This bench is pretty sturdy, but it does wobble slightly. It supports my weight fine when I use dumbells. I expect it to last me a decent amount of time. If you like the price it’s worth it.
customer_reviews.author: Ana I Altamirano

customer_reviews.title: Bought this during cyber week and got a good deal. I just needed something compact to do ...
customer_reviews.text: Bought this during cyber week and got a good deal. I just needed something compact to do some light weights in my tiny office/gym room. Padding is great. Seems sturdy and durable.
customer_reviews.author: franziz

customer_reviews.title: Screws have a tendency to come loose making the bench ...
customer_reviews.text: Screws have a tendency to come loose making the bench wobbly. Material is itchy when wet. We've used over its weight limit on it with no problems.
customer_reviews.author: StephZ

customer_reviews.title: Easy to assemble
customer_reviews.text: Great bench, doesn’t have much weight though, moves a lot when I set on bench
customer_reviews.author: James

customer_reviews.title: Solid 4 stars. Almost 5.
customer_reviews.text: Great bench. Easy to assemble. Some of the fabric on the under side of the bench had a small tear. And it was priced higher than I expected. Drop the price by $10 and ai would gladly give it 5 stars. Overall, it is a good, functional, flat weight bench.
customer_reviews.author: JohnSupreme

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: poor quality assurance, package came missing necessary screws and bolts to install. absolute waste of time.
customer_reviews.author: Lori D.

customer_reviews.title: feels cheap
customer_reviews.text: for the price I expected it to be a little more sturdy. For a big guy I dont feel like I can sit in the middle of the bench making me sit on the ends over the support.
customer_reviews.author: Marcus

customer_reviews.title: easy to assemble
customer_reviews.text: I was a little skeptical about buying this bench. I got it, easy to assemble, very steady, 30$ cheaper than the brand counterpart. Using it with no concerns
customer_reviews.author: Ali Harb

customer_reviews.title: For the price I could not be happier with this bench
customer_reviews.text: For the price I could not be happier with this bench. It is solid and stable. I bought this particular bench because it slides under my pool table when not in use.
customer_reviews.author: tctopcat

customer_reviews.title: Good for the price
customer_reviews.text: The box was torn open and the pack of screws was open but somehow everything was there! Also slight rusting on metal bar that pad sits on.
customer_reviews.author: Amy P

customer_reviews.title: It was easy to put together and fits nicely in the corner ...
customer_reviews.text: I've used this bench only once but my son loves it. It was easy to put together and fits nicely in the corner of the room. It's wide enough to hold the average body and seems stable to me.
customer_reviews.author: EPena

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: It's inexpensive, the size is about right, and it has held up so far.
customer_reviews.author: Mainsil

customer_reviews.title: First impression is this is a well built bench. ...
customer_reviews.text: First impression is this is a well built bench. All I've done is assemble it so far but it went together in 10-15 minutes. All required hardware was in the box including the metric Allen wrench. Feels stable and strong. I'll put it to the test tonight.
customer_reviews.author: Michelle

customer_reviews.title: Get what you pay for
customer_reviews.text: Does the job, but you get what you pay for.. it's no top notch bench. But it's still a pretty decent deal
customer_reviews.author: sean

customer_reviews.title: Not sturdy
customer_reviews.text: Not very sturdy. I got it because it had great reviews for a good price. After about five uses, it is very wobbly.
customer_reviews.author: bg67991

customer_reviews.title: This review is being shoved down my throat
customer_reviews.text: Works just like a bench should work. Can I go back to my life now?
customer_reviews.author: Brian McGranahan

customer_reviews.title: good bench
customer_reviews.text: I am very pleased with this bench. Obviously there are better benches out there, but a great bench for the price.
customer_reviews.author: D. Chase

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for what I need
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for what I need. Seems stout as I put 300ish lbs on it daily. The hardware was loose in the box and the box was slightly damaged from shipping, but nothing was missing.
customer_reviews.author: JWolfy

customer_reviews.title: ... is strong well built puts together quickly and is great to use very comfortable
customer_reviews.text: This bench is strong well built puts together quickly and is great to use very comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: Paul924

customer_reviews.title: Worth the price
customer_reviews.text: Easy to assemble. Holds me and my weights nice and steady.
customer_reviews.author: David

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Steady and a very good bench overall considering the cost.
customer_reviews.author: Jimmy

customer_reviews.title: Extremely easy to put together
customer_reviews.text: Extremely easy to put together. I don't normally assemble things but this was a snap. Took me 30 minutes. It is very long and sturdy. I'm very happy.
customer_reviews.author: crissyren

customer_reviews.title: Great buy!!
customer_reviews.text: Product as described!! Perfect addition to my home gym!! Great buy for the price!!
customer_reviews.author: Michael

customer_reviews.title: This was the tool that took a novice and turned ...
customer_reviews.text: This was the tool that took a novice and turned my home into a gym when I can't get out of the house. Also can supply additional seating at parties in a pinch.
customer_reviews.author: Pope Fred

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Sturdy and comfy for working out! Keep in mind the weight limit if your lifting heavy weights.
customer_reviews.author: barbara

customer_reviews.title: good purchase
customer_reviews.text: Very sturdy but had to send first one back due to bench foam defect. 2nd one is perfectly strong and even.
customer_reviews.author: Yoli

customer_reviews.title: Awesome!!!
customer_reviews.text: Item very easy to put together, came with every nut and bolt and the machining was perfect. Highly recommend for home use...very sturdy!
customer_reviews.author: Jack

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: awesome sturdy bench that was less than 10 minutes to assemble.
customer_reviews.author: KH

customer_reviews.title: Incredibly easy to assemble
customer_reviews.text: Came quickly. Incredibly easy to assemble. Very high quality (unexpectedly high) for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Anthony

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Very easy to put together... It was so easy my 9 yr old put it together. :)
customer_reviews.author: Kristina

customer_reviews.title: Great affordable bench
customer_reviews.text: Quick setup. Sturdy and affordable. Took 10 minutes to screw everything together. It's only 4 parts.
customer_reviews.author: Mike

customer_reviews.title: Easy to assemble and sturdy
customer_reviews.text: Phenomenal product! Easy to assemble and sturdy. Looks great and feels better.
customer_reviews.author: GL

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: This bench is great and super easy to assemble. I use it as a makeshift piano bench/workout bench
customer_reviews.author: Bobby B

customer_reviews.title: My bench did not come with the nuts and bolts ...
customer_reviews.text: My bench did not come with the nuts and bolts to assemble - I bought for my son and he just informed me - is there any way to order the nuts and bolts to assemble the bench? Thanks
customer_reviews.author: Michelle

customer_reviews.title: LOVE IT!
customer_reviews.text: This bench is exactly what I was looking for- easy to assemble (took me 15 mins) and is lightweight but very sturdy.. Great quality and price! It's PERFECT!
customer_reviews.author: Tina F.

customer_reviews.title: ready to workout
customer_reviews.text: Exactly how the reviewers described it. Wasn't disappointed at all.
customer_reviews.author: Davina

customer_reviews.title: Good buy for price
customer_reviews.text: It has been sturdy. It took me about 10 minutes to put together. There was a slight problem with one bolt but I got it to work. Not heavy and easy to move around. I would recommend.
customer_reviews.author: The Learner

customer_reviews.title: Very happy with prouduct and speedy delivery
customer_reviews.text: Very happy with prouduct and speedy delivery. Bench was exactly as described and was easy to assemble. It was delivered immediately!
customer_reviews.author: kimkim

customer_reviews.title: no frills and comfortable. Can't go wrong
customer_reviews.text: As advertised, no frills and comfortable. Can't go wrong, particularly with Prime shipping.
customer_reviews.author: Jesse Cohen

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: Horrible bench! Very unstable! Not safe! Had to give it one star just to post this review.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

product_meta.title: CAP Barbell Flat Weight Bench
feature_bullets: Tech Specs - Assembled dimensions are 42x14x17 inches.

Construction - Built with 2x2 cold rolled steel tubing allowing this bench to securely handle heavy weight loads. Tested based on ASTM standard to hold up to 1000 lbs. Recommended maximum weight capacity of 500 lbs.
Comfort - Double stitched boxed pad is comfortable yet firm utilizing new foam material and carb compliant plywood.
Reliability- durable powder coat finish and zinc hardware provide exceptional maintenance-free durability.
Trust experience - Cap has been a pioneer in fitness with over 30 years experience and locations worldwide. Chances are if you have ever worked out you have worked out with a CAP product.
Attention - User Manual has been updated to reflect correct weight capacity of 500 lbs., including user
